item.title: Day 2: Santa and the Rakupod Wranglers
item.author: Page(/authors/tbrowder)
item.description: Santa's world was increasingly going high-tech, and his IT department was polishing off its new process that could take the millions of letters received from boys and girls around the world, scan them into digital form with state-of-the-art optical character recognition hardware, and produce outputs that could greatly streamline the Santa Corporation's production for Christmas delivery. One problem had initially stymied them, but consultants from the Raku community came to their aid.
